Entries.262214001/n Si_SF_M2/t 1350 1410/f Sebas: continue/5 7/farmer 3 5 2 Vincent 5 5 2 Sebastian 4 6 0/fade/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Alright, does anyone have questions before we get started?"/pause 200/quickQuestion Do you have any questions?#Nope.#Why is Vincent here?#What are we doing here again?(break)speak Sebastian "Good, let's get started."(break)speak Sebastian "Sam's letting me borrow him."\speak Vincent "My big brother said I can touch as many frogs as I want as long as I don't tell Mom!"(break)speak Sebastian "We are starting a conservation project for the endangered Gourmand Frog species."/pause 200/move Sebastian 2 0 1/pause 200/advancedMove Sebastian true -4 0 3 200 4 0 1 200/speak Sebastian "As a conservation project, our objectives are to enhance the survival prospects of the Gourmand Frog population with respect to the local environment, study and monitor local Gourmand Frog behavioral patterns, and spread awareness about Gourmand Frogs and the dangers they face.#$b#Our first step will be to set up habitats around the nearby lake where they can gather and thrive.#$b#To do that we'll need natural materials.#$b#I can get wood and stone from my mom.#$b#That leaves things like moss, fiber, and bug meat."/pause 200/speak Vincent "I can get bug meat!#$b#It's the squishy pink stuff right?"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Yeah, that would be good.#$b#@, what would you like to gather? Remember, we'll need a lot of it."/pause 200/quickQuestion Which material would you like to contribute?#Moss.#Fiber.(break)addQuest Si_SF_Q2\speak Sebastian "Great, I'll get the fiber.#$b#Bring it to me once you've gathered it all."(break)addQuest Si_SF_Q3\speak Sebastian "Great, I'll get the moss.#$b#Bring it to me once you've gathered it all."/pause 200/stopAdvancedMoves/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 200/speak Sebastian "It'll be a long road, but with our help, the Gourmand Frog population will grow to levels not seen since people started living in the valley.#$b#Let's get to it!$7"/emote farmer 20 true/emote Vincent 20/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262214002/n Si_SF_M3/t 1450 1510/f Sebas: continue/46 27/farmer 45 26 1 Vincent 46 25 2 Sebastian 47 26 3/addConversationTopic SebFrogLake 6/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Everyone have their materials?"/pause 200/speak Vincent "Yup! Look!"/pause 200/playSound hitEnemy/addObject 46 26 684/pause 200/quickQuestion ...#I'm ready too.#Where do you think he gets that stuff?(break)speak Sebastian "Alright, let's get started."(break)speak Sebastian "I don't ask.$5#$b#Anyway, let's get started."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "We'll split up to set up several habitat areas.#$b#Try to find wet, shaded places with good plant coverage close to the water."/pause 200/emote farmer 32 true/emote Vincent 32/pause 200/fade/removeObject 46 26/pause 200/fade/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Good work today.#$b#I've marked the locations of the habitats on a map so I can check them regularly.#$b#The eggs I got from @ are still incubating, so we'll let those areas settle for a bit till they're ready to hatch.#$b#That usually happens sometime around the start of spring."/pause 200/speak Vincent "Does that mean there's gonna be lots of frogs around here?"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Yeah, this place will be full of them.$1"/pause 200/speak Vincent "Cool! I can't wait to tell Miss Penny!"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 32 true/emote farmer 32/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262214007/n Si_SF_M5/t 0800 1700/z Sprin: continue/85 29/farmer 91 26 3 Sebastian 81 26 3 Demetrius -1000 -1000 0/addConversationTopic SebFrogSick 6/skippable/showFrame Sebastian 54/fade/pause 200/move farmer -2 0 3 true/pause 100/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/move farmer -6 0 3 true/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 100/emote Sebastian 16/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Hi @. I didn't hear you come over."/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/pause 200/speak Sebastian "It's this frog.#$b#It's acting lethargic, and its skin doesn't look good.$2#$b#I think it's sick, but I'm not sure what to do about it."/pause 200/quickQuestion What should we do?#Does your conservation project kit have a guide for this?#Why don't you ask Demetrius?(break)speak Sebastian "I checked, I can't find matching symptoms in there.#$b#...$2#$b#I guess I could ask Demetrius...$5"(break)speak Sebastian "I guess I could do that...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/pause 200/speak Sebastian "It's just kind of...#$b#Awkward, you know?$2#$b#We don't really talk much.#$b#He's not a bad guy or anything.#$b#We just don't have much in common."/pause 200/question fork0 "#You're both interested in natural aspects of the Valley, that's something in common.#Are you really not going to help a sick frog because you don't want to talk to him?"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I guess you're right.$2#$b#Come on, he's probably in his lab right now."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap ScienceHouse/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Demetrius 22 19/faceDirection Demetrius 1/warp Sebastian 17 20/faceDirection Sebastian 1/warp farmer 15 20/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 19 21/fade/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Hey, uh, Demetrius?"/pause 200/emote Demetrius 16/pause 100/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 100/speak Demetrius "Hello Sebastian.#$b#And to you, @! How are you doing?$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Demetrius "What do you need today?"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I was wondering if you could check on this frog.$2#$b#It seems sick, and I'm not sure how to help it."/pause 200/emote Demetrius 8/pause 200/speak Demetrius "Bring it over here and I'll have a look."/pause 200/move Sebastian 5 0 0/faceDirection Demetrius 2/pause 200/emote Demetrius 40/pause 200/speak Demetrius "Hmm...$5#$b#These look like symptoms of chytridiomycosis.$2"/pause 100/emote Sebastian 16/pause 100/speak Sebastian "That doesn't sound good.$2"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "It's not.$2#$b#It's a type of fungal infection.$2#$b#But don't worry, it's treatable with an anti-fungal solution.$5#$b#I can make some for you."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What could have caused it?#$b#I'm worried about the other frogs in the lake.$2"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "Likely a pH instability.$5#$b#Fungal growth can occur in damp soil at certain pH levels."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "pH?"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "It's a way of measuring how acidic a substance is."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Is there a way to change it?"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "Yes!#$b#That's actually been one of my projects here in the Valley.$1#$b#Let's start preparing the anti-fungal medication for this one and then go collect some soil samples.#$b#I can show you how to test the pH levels here in the lab.$1"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "...Okay."/pause 200/emote Demetrius 32/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 100/message "It looks like Sebastian and Demetrius have a plan. I should leave them to it."/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262214008/n Si_SF_M5/t 1000 1400/z Sprin: continue/18 11/farmer 10 10 3 Penny 17 12 0 Jas 17 9 2 Vincent 19 10 3/addConversationTopic SebFrogSchool 5/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak Jas "And that's my presentation on the butterfly life cycle!$4"/pause 200/speak Penny "Very good Jas!#$b#Your drawings had a lot of detail in them."/pause 200/emote Jas 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Now it's your turn Vincent."/pause 200/move Jas -1 0 2/move Vincent 0 -1 3/move Jas 0 1 1/move Vincent -2 0 2/pause 200/speak Vincent "I did my project on frogs!#$b#I like frogs because they're slimy and they make funny noises.#$b#They come from eggs that look like jelly eyeballs.#$b#When they hatch they don't have hands and feet.#$b#That's when they're called tad-poles."/pause 200/emote Jas 16/pause 100/speak Penny "Do you have a question, Jas?"/pause 200/speak Jas "Baby frogs don't have hands or feet?$3"/pause 200/speak Vincent "Nope!"/pause 200/speak Jas "That's so sad!$2#$b#How do they move?$2"/pause 200/speak Vincent "They have tails, and they move like fish!$1"/pause 200/speak Jas "Oh, okay!#$b#That's better then."/pause 200/emote Penny 20/pause 200/speak Vincent "And when they grow up, they get hands and feet!#$b#That way they can jump really high.#$b#And their tail goes away too."/pause 200/speak Jas "Wow, they change like butterflies do!$1"/pause 200/speak Penny "Excellent work Vincent.#$b#I can see you put a lot of effort into your presentation."/pause 200/speak Vincent "Sebastian lets me visit the frogs at the lake a lot!#$b#But they're all asleep right now.$3#$b#He said they'll wake up again in spring."/pause 200/speak Jas "Like butterfly cocoons?"/pause 200/speak Vincent "I don't know.$3"/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Good observation Jas!#$b#It may seem similar, but it's actually a different process called 'hibernation'.#$b#We'll learn about that during our next lesson."/pause 200/emote Jas 56/emote Vincent 20/pause 200/speak Jas "Okay Ms. Penny!"/pause 200/speak Vincent "Yay! More frog lessons!"/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262214009/n Si_SF_M5/p Sebastian/f Sebas: continue/18 13/farmer 12 11 1 Sebastian 19 11 0/addConversationTopic SebFrogIsland 6/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 100/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Hey @, enjoying the island?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I'm expanding my frog conservation project to this island.$1#$b#Gourmand frogs were once native here too, and I want to bring them back.#$b#I've been scouting out areas for habitats.#$b#You own some property here, right?#$b#Do you mind if I look around there too?"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Thanks @. I appreciate it."/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "You know, there are old tales about Gourmand frogs living for hundreds of years and growing as big as humans.#$b#It's never been proven though.$1#$b#I doubt they'll ever get that big, but I hope I can at least grow their population so they're not in danger anymore.$7"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262214010/e 262214009/A SebFrogIsland/f: continue/4 7/farmer 5 8 0/skippable/addTemporaryActor Gourmand 32 32 4 4 0 true Character/fade/pause 200/message "How are you doing, bub?"/pause 100/message "Still growing the good food?"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/message "Good, good."/pause 200/message "..."/pause 200/message "I see more of my kind lately."/pause 200/message "It's been a long time since we all roamed these jungles."/pause 200/message "I was worried I would be the last one."/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion How do you respond?#There's a human who's been trying to help frogs thrive here.#Do you want to meet the person responsible for it?#(Stay silent.)(break)message "Interesting..."\pause 200\message "Bring them to me."(break)message "..."\pause 200\message "Hmm..."\pause 200\message "I do."\pause 200\message "Bring them to me."(break)message "Hmm..."\pause 200\message "There is a reason."\pause 200\message "...But I do not know it."\pause 200\message "Give me one more favor, farmer."\pause 200\emote farmer 8\pause 200\message "Find the reason and bring it to me."\pause 200\message "If danger approaches, I must know."/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262214011/e 262214010/p Sebastian/f Seba: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 11 1 Sebastian 19 11 0/addConversationTopic SebFrogFrog 6/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap Island_W/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 69 11/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Sebastian 69 8/faceDirection Sebastian 3/showFrame Sebastian 54/viewport 67 12/fade/pause 200/emote Sebastian 56/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Hey @. Want to join me?#$b#I think I've found a pretty good habitat spot.$7"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 8/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What's up?$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/changeToTemporaryMap Island_FarmCave/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 5 8/warp Sebastian 4 8/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Sebastian 0/addTemporaryActor Gourmand 32 32 4 4 0 true Character/viewport 4 7/fade/playMusic FrogCave/pause 300/message "So... You are the one restoring my kind."/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 300/message "You have filled the lakes and jungles with the lively croaks of the young."/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 300/message "Tell me, what is the purpose for your actions?"/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/quickQuestion Uh oh, Sebastian might be frozen in shock...#(Nudge Sebastian.)#(Poke Sebastian.)#(Kick Sebastian.)(break)pause 200\(break)pause 200\(break)pause 200/speak Sebastian "Wha-oh!$3#$b#Uh, right.$3#$b#Um...$3"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/speak Sebastian "...Sorry, just processing.$3"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I mean, frogs are pretty cool.#$b#They've been around for hundreds of millions of years, and many can jump over twenty times their height.#$b#When @ showed me the Gourmand frog eggs they found, I realized the frogs still had a small presence in the Valley, but no one else knew enough to do anything about it.#$b#So I decided to.#$b#And I found out a lot of people actually get really interested when you present things like this in a cool way.#$b#So I've been getting a lot more help back home, and since access to the island opened up, I figured I could spread it here too.$7"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Uh, if that's alright.$2"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/stopMusic/message "..."/pause 200/message "...You spread eggs throughout the lands?"/pause 200/message "You blanket the riverbanks in wood and moss and fiber?"/pause 200/message "You enter my cave and ask for permission to continue?"/pause 300/emote Sebastian 28/pause 300/speak Sebastian "...yes?$2"/pause 300/message "..."/pause 300/message "You have it!"/playMusic FrogCave/pause 200/emote Sebastian 16/pause 200/message "It is good to hear the croaking of my kin throughout the island once more."/pause 200/message "You and your actions are welcomed here."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 100/speak Sebastian "I... I'm..."/pause 200/shake Sebastian 100/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Thank you.$7#$b#I will.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262214012/e 262214011/e 262214006/e 2622: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3/addConversationTopic SebFrogStay 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 200/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Hey @.#$b#Just a second."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 100/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 200/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "Thanks for waiting.#$b#I'm working on the frog conservation website.#$b#It's been getting a lot of hits, even from outside the Valley.$7#$b#People everywhere want to help by donating or starting their own projects.$1#$b#Haley's even trying to get me to start a social media account for it.#$b#I think I'll leave that part to her though.$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Sebastian "You know... I used to really want to move to the city.#$b#I wanted to be a cool programmer, known for making popular video games and stuff like that.$2#$b#But ever since I started this project, I've been feeling closer to the Valley.#$b#And the people in it.$2#$b#So I've decided to stay.$7#$b#Sam and Abigail have been learning about frogs so they can help me with the habitats, and Sam's mom makes us snacks to take with us.#$b#Vincent stops by a lot too. Penny says he's been doing really well in school because of the project.$1#$b#Shane's helping me set up wildlife cameras, and Maru built these really tiny trackers that we can use to track the frogs to find out more about them.$7#$b#My mom keeps giving me tips on stuff like wood and moss.#$b#And Demetrius is really excited to continue taking soil samples to 'maintain a balanced pH for optimal growth conditions'.$7#$b#I'm still figuring out what that means exactly, but I have to admit, working with him can be kind of cool sometimes.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What I'm trying to say is, thanks @.$7#$b#Thanks for helping me with this.$7#$b#I'll never forget it.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262214014/e 262214013/e 9333220/t 2000 2: continue/67 24/farmer 66 22 2 Sebastian 67 22 2/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I'm so hapy about what we've built here.#$b#The frogs are thriving and healthy.#$b#More frog conservation programs are popping up in other places, taking inspiration from us.#$b#I never imagined things could get to this point.$1"/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Thank you @.$7#$b#You're the best partner anyone could ask for.$7#$b#And I hope I can make you as happy as you've made me.$4"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/playSound croak/pause 200/emote Sebastian 16/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 200/emote Sebastian 20/pause 200/speak Sebastian "@! Do you hear that?$7"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/playSound croak/pause 300/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 200/speak Sebastian "It's like they're singing to us!$1"/pause 200/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 200/playSound croak/playSound croak/pause 200/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/playSound croak/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 100/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/playSound croak/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Sebastian -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer 2 0/playSound croak/pause 100//playSound croak/pause 100/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 200/playSound croak/pause 100/emote Sebastian 20/emote farmer 20/playSound croak/pause 200/playSound croak/pause 100/playSound croak/end/fade
